General.Name: DiamondRock Hospitality Company
General.Description: DiamondRock Hospitality Company is a self-advised real estate investment trust (REIT) that is an owner of a leading portfolio of geographically diversified hotels concentrated in leisure destinations and top gateway markets. The Company currently owns 36 premium quality hotels with over 9,700 rooms. The Company has strategically positioned its portfolio to be operated both under leading global brand families as well as independent boutique hotels in the lifestyle segment.
General.Address: 2 Bethesda Metro Center, Bethesda, MD, United States, 20814

3.Name: Mr. William J. Tennis
3.Title: Exec. VP, Gen. Counsel & Corp. Sec.
